mapper.select: SELECT board_id as boardId , title as title , content as content , latitude as latitude , longitude as longitude , view_cnt as viewCnt , reg_id as regId , reg_dtt as regDtt , (SELECT img_id as imgId FROM image WHERE board_id = b.board_id ORDER BY img_id DESC LIMIT 0, 1 ) as ThumbImgId FROM board b WHERE latitude BETWEEN #{swLat} AND #{neLat} AND longitude BETWEEN #{swLng} AND #{neLng} ORDER BY board_id DESC
